trans-unit.target: Configura uma autorização de aplicação Web.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The AuthorizationSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `authorization` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AuthorizationSection fornece uma forma de aceder e modificar programaticamente o `authorization` secção de um ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This type is part of a group that includes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule>, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection>, and the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleAction> types.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo faz parte de um grupo que inclua o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule>, a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection>e o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleAction>tipos.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleAction> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The AuthorizationSection can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AuthorizationSection o pode ler e escrever informações de e para a secção do ficheiro de configuração, de acordo com a propriedade de secção <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>cujo valor é <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition> </xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> relacionada

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationSection"></xref> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationSection"> </xref> através das predefinições de classe.

trans-unit.source: The AuthorizationSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de AuthorizationSection não se destina a ser utilizado diretamente a partir do seu código.

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se pelo sistema de configuração do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Obter uma instância do <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationSection>classe utilizando o <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>método.</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationSection>

trans-unit.source: The Rules collection returned by this method does not refer to any actual element in the underlying configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de regras devolvida por este método não se refere a qualquer elemento real no ficheiro de configuração subjacente.

trans-unit.source: It is a construct that allows easy access to the rules it contains.
trans-unit.target: É uma construção que permite o facilitar o acesso às regras que nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: This is a common pattern for handling the elements of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Este é um padrão comum para processar os elementos de um ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> rules defined by the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection"> </xref> de <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"> </xref> regras definidas pelo <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationSection"> </xref>.
